ProductInfo.Features:
High Capacity, 6600mAh; 2-3 full charges or add 25 hours talk time to your iPhone 4S / 4G / 3GS; 1-2 charges for Samsung Galaxy S3, 200 hours + audio playback, or 200% - 300% to the battery life of most mobile phones
Convenient flashlight updated to prevent accidental activation: lights only after pressing the power button for 2 seconds; 4 LED indicators reveal the battery level; Input: DC 5V 1A,  it also charges via standard USB or AC adapter (not included)LED indicates charge level
Portable & stylish design; Easily fits into your bag to provide instant power; PERFECT for long plane flights, road trips, or whenever you need to charge your mobile devices wherever you are
Reliable Lithium Polymer battery ensures high quality; 500+ recharge cycles over the life of the battery
This brand new item of high qulity  is your best helper in your daily life
ProductInfo.Name: TCL® Brand New 6600mAh Portable Power bank Pack External Battery Charger for Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1, Note 8, Tab 2, S4, S3, Note 2; iPad 4, 3, 2, 1, iPhone 5, 4S, 4; HTC One, EVO, Thunderbolt, Incredible, Droid DNA; Motorola ATRIX, Droid; Google Nexus 4, Nexus 7, Nexus 10; LG Optimus; Blackberry Playbook (Dual USB Output: 5V, 2A and 5V, 1A) (4 connectors for mobile phones and tablets)-Black
